attributes.additional_details:
Knife crime is through the roof, our young people are no longer safe to walk the streets of the town in which they live.
The mayor of London sadiq Khan is massively incompetent in office and has offered nothing of benefit to the British people, instead spending the British purse on infrastructure not needed as desperately as other resources.
£900 MILLION spent on cycle lanes in London whilst next to nothing on policing. 
Simply “sending heart felt condolences” isn’t working.
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan is a drain on resources and simply incompetent , to date, has offered nothing to improve the quality of security for the British people. Knife crime is a pandemic in our capital and needs a l tough no holds barred approach which Sadiq simply cant do this.

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is elected by the people of London, not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
